H0.text: Pleiotropic effects cause the symptoms associated with sickle‑cell disease.

H1.text: Genetic drift causes symptoms associated with sickle‑cell disease.

H2.text: Spontaneous mutation causes the symptoms associated with sickle‑cell disease.

H3.text: Transgene effects cause symptoms associated with sickle‑cell disease.

A4.text: All of the major organs are affected by sickle cell disease.

A5.text: Sickle cell disease may lead to various acute and chronic complications, several of which have a high mortality rate.
